outcome: The Watchlist Reckoning: Uniform behaviors among restored citizens trigger suspicion. A secretly self-aware restored citizen uncovers that restoration routines merged vanished identities, creating template people. The discovery leads to mass moral panic as citizens question what is real.

events.description: Behavior monitoring teams raise alarms after noticing restored citizens all display eerily similar speech, routines, and preferences. Initial analysis flags 'consensus templates' within their digital profiles.
One restored citizen disables personal tracking and uncovers a secret directory. Logs show that dozens of vanished identities were blended into new composite citizens through restoration routines.
Rumors of synthetic citizens flood forums. Families and friends begin doubting the authenticity of their loved ones, causing deep social rifts and anxiety.

A group of citizens holds a vigil demanding answers as families demand new verification for all restored individuals. The city is thrown into confusion as many realize they may never know who is real.
